properties.description: This path will follow an user given an authtoken and user transfer object.
This will get the followee count for a user with an alias and authtoken.
This path will get all the followees for a user given a authtoken, alias, page size, and last item.
This path groups all the followee logic together.
This will get the follower count for a user with an alias and authtoken.
This path will check to see if a user is following another selected user given an authtoken, user data transfer object, and another selected data transfer object.
This path will get all the followers for a user given a authtoken, alias, page size, and last item.
This path groups all the follower logic together with additional logic for following that isn't specific to either followers or followees.
This path will get a user given an authtoken and alias.
This path will log in an user given an alias and password.
This path will logout a user given an authtoken.
This path will register an user given a firstname, lastname, alias, password, userImageBytes array, and image file extension.
This path will get all the feed items for a user given a authtoken, alias, page size, and last item.
This path will post a status given a status data transfer object and authtoken.
This path will get all the stories for a user given a authtoken, alias, page size, and last item.
This path helps group all the status logic together.
This path will unfollow an user given an authtoken and user transfer object.
